question: Write the expected products of the reaction of each of the following sugars with (i)  $\ce{Br_2}$, $\ce{H_2O}$; (ii) $\ce{HNO_3}$,$\ce{H_2O}$, $60 \degree C$; (iii) $\ce{NaBH_4}$, $\ce{CH_3OH}$; and (iv) excess $\ce{C_6H_5NHNH_2}$, $\ce{CH_3CH_2OH}$, $\Delta$. Find the common names of all the products. (a) D-(-)-Threose; (b) D-(+)-xylose; (c) D-(+)- galactose.
